table.name: vtiger_blockplan
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_blockplan` ( `blockplanid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `blockplan_no` VARCHAR(32) DEFAULT NULL, `fullname` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `assesment_no` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`blockplanid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_blockplancf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_blockplancf` ( `blockplanid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`blockplanid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
